name: John Doe
bio: John is a passionate botanist with a focus on medicinal plants of the Indian subcontinent. He has contributed detailed information and images for several tree species.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Jane is an environmental enthusiast and photographer, specializing in the flora of Asia and Australia. Her contributions include high-quality images and ecological notes.

name: David Lee
bio: David is a conservationist with extensive experience in arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and the Middle East. He focuses on drought-resistant species and their traditional uses.
